remarks: Definition of the composition of arrows.  Since arrows are tagged with domain and codomain, this does not need to be a 5-ary operation like the regular composition in a category ` comp ` .  Instead, it is a partial binary operation on arrows, which is defined when the domain of the first arrow matches the codomain of the second.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
